name: H15 Boutique Hotel
description: The 5-star, H15 Boutique Hotel is a part of an impressive, historic building in the centre of Warsaw where in the pre-war times the Soviet embassy was located. It's been awarded by Michelin and Forbes in 2018. It offers accommodation in stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and a coffee maker. A conference room is also available. Each apartment is air-conditioned, with modern interiors and a seating area. Guests can relax in front of a LED TV with satellite channels. Some apartments feature a balcony and all have a safety deposit box. There is a kitchenette with a Nespresso coffee maker and free Fair Trade coffee. The bathroom is finished with stone elements and offers free toiletries. Recommended by Michelin Guide, the Signature Restaurant offers international cuisine. A drink or two can be enjoyed in the bar. H15 Boutique Hotel is situated only 200 metres from numerous restaurants and pubs. Metro Centrum Station is 750 metres away and the Central Train Station is 950 metres away.

name: Intercontinental Warsaw, An IHG Hotel
description: InterContinental Warsaw is one of Warsaw's well-known landmarks. Its city centre location allows quick access to attractions like Warsaw Old Town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Voted Poland's Leading Hotel in 2022, it has more than 1340 sqm of superb conference space, including a ballroom and the private 41st-floor Club Lounge. Delight yourself in sophisticated Polish cuisine in our Platter restaurant. Relax in the 43rd-floor pool and enjoy a spectacular view from our stylish rooms.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hampton by Hilton Warsaw Mokotow
description: Stay at the Hampton by Hilton Warsaw Mokotow and enjoy an excellent location in the heart of Poland's leading business district, just 5 minutes from the Warsaw Chopin International Airport. Business travelers will appreciate easy access to major business parks around the hotel, while leisure guests can enjoy a wealth of nearby shopping, dining and entertainment options. Our Mokotow hotel rooms are stylish, modern spaces featuring useful amenities including an iron and ironing board, coffeemaker and LCD flat screen TV with free movie channels. Get work done or keep up with family and friends with complimentary WiFi. When you’re ready to sleep, get a great night’s rest in our comfiest amenity yet, a clean and fresh Hampton bed®. Enjoy free hot breakfast every day and free coffee and tea in the lobby 24-hours a day. Keep up with your workout routine in our complimentary fitness center. Here on business? We offer a boardroom and two flexible meeting rooms. When you get hungry, dine out at a choice of nearby restaurants including Jeff's Galeria Mokotow, Mango House Indian Restaurant and Top Chef House. In the warmer weather, relax outdoors on our summer terrace. Making you happy makes us happy. If we can make your stay better, talk to any member of our team, and we’ll make sure you’re 100% happy. GUARANTEED.™Hilton

name: Hampton by Hilton Warsaw City Centre
description: Welcome to the Hampton by Hilton Warsaw City Centre hotel, where you’ll enjoy a fantastic central location two blocks from the city’s main train station and easy access to the historical Old Town area via public transport. Warsaw Chopin Airport is just a 15-minute drive away. Shopping, dining, and entertainment options are all within easy reach of this modern Warsaw hotel. Nearby popular attractions include the Palace of Culture and Science, St. John's Archcathedral, the Royal Castle, and the National Museum, all within 10 minutes. Settle into a spacious, tastefully decorated guest room at this hotel in Warsaw and enjoy a range of contemporary amenities designed to help you relax and stay productive. Stay connected at the ergonomic desk with free WiFi, and relax in the comfortable armchair and watch movies on the 55-inch HDTV. Listen to your favorite music and get a great night’s sleep on the comfy bed. We offer meeting space. Food, music and decorations are available for your MICE functions. Energize with the latest exercise equipment in the free fitness center. Enjoy the hot breakfast included when you stay at this stylish Warsaw hotel. Enjoy a quick bite or a light meal in the 24/7 snack area.Hilton

name: Airport Hotel Okęcie
description: Located just 1 km from the Warsaw Chopin Airport, Hotel Airport Okęcie offers free airport shuttle and free Wi-Fi in the entire building. All air-conditioned rooms and apartments at the Hotel Airport Okęcie are fitted with tea/coffee facilities and satellite TV with pay channels. Guests can benefit from a minibar. Each unit's modern bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel offers its guests a wide gastronomic offer by award-winning chefs; including Polish and international dishes as well as varied breakfasts. The hotel's Chocolate Café serves a variety of desserts, chocolates, drinks and snacks. At additional charge, all guests of the Hotel Airport Okęcie have access to the hotel’s wellness centre, which features a steam sauna, a mud bath and a sensation shower. Free access to the on-site gym is provided. The hotel also offers a bicycle rental. Warsaw Central Railway Station and the Palace of Culture and Science are about 6 km away from the hotel.

name: Regent Warsaw Hotel
description: Regent Warsaw Hotel, a luxurious business hotel set on the lovely tree-lined Belwederska Boulevard in the citys elegant diplomatic district and only steps away from the astoundingly beautiful Royal Gardens of azienki Park. The hotel is ideally situated close to the business centers, as well as on direct route to Warsaws old town, fashionable shops of Nowy wiat, theatres and museums. It is also easily accessible from the Fryderyk Chopin airport.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Warszawa
description: Hotel Warszawa is a 5-star hotel offering a fitness center, spa and wellness center along with free WIFI. It is situated 700 metres from Parade Square and Holy Cross Church. Providing their guests with a 24-hour front desk, this property also has a sun terrace and a restaurant that serves local cuisine. The rooms in Hotel Warszawa come equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Certain rooms offer a terrace, while all units feature a wardrobe. In this property the guests are served a continental breakfast. They also have an access to a bar. The guests are provided with an access to spa and wellness facilities including a sauna and an indoor pool during their stay at the property. Bike hire and car hire are also available at this accommodation. The area is popular for cycling. Hotel Warszawa is located 800 metres from Palace of Culture & Science, while Zacheta National Art Gallery is less than 1 km away. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Bellotto
description: Located in the 16th century Bishops Palace in the vicinity of the Old Town of Warsaw, 200 metres from Royal Castle, Hotel Bellotto features air-conditioned rooms and private parking. There is a casino on site and guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and bar. Every classically furnished room has a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience.Hotel Bellotto features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. There is also a sauna and a steam room as well as a fitness area and a massage room. Sigismund's Column is 200 metres from Hotel Bellotto, while Grand Theatre - Polish National Opera is 300 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Warsaw Chopin Airport, 9 km from Hotel Bellotto.

name: Hotel Holiday Park
description: Located in Warsaw, about 10 km from the city centre, Hotel Holiday Park boasts a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Every room is equipped with a TV with cable channels. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. A 24-hour front desk is available at the property. The Museum of Polish Jews' History is 7 km away from Hotel Holiday Park. The nearest airport is Warsaw Chopin Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Holiday Inn Warsaw City Centre
description: Holiday Inn® Warsaw City Centre is located in the heart of Warsaw; close to museums, Jewish quarter and a 10-minute walk from popular Zlote Tarasy shopping mall, with a wide variety of shops and cinema. Convenient transport links (Metro, trams and buses) are within a 5 minutes walking distance. The Central Railway station is just 1km away and Warsaw Chopin Airport is 8km away, 30 minutes by taxi or 20 minutes by fast train. Business guests find it easy to walk to Warsaw Spire and other prominent business parks like Browary Warszawskie. Expo XXI is less than 10 minutes by taxi (2,4 km). Our modern hotel features 256 stylish rooms and suites with great touches like underfloor heating in the bathrooms and Wi-Fi included for all our guests. Our guests can experience our Open Lobby concept, a great space to relax and unwind after a day of work or sightseeing which provides restaurant and bar services throughout the day. Our menus include a selection of modern Polish cuisine and international classics and a full range of local and international drinks and cocktails. Our hotel also features a modern fitness area at the top floor of the building with the magnificent views over Warsaw’s skyline as the inspiring backdrop for your workout session. If you are traveling with your family, we have a range of family rooms and suites which can provide all comforts you may need to enjoy a wonderful stay, Additionally, Kids Eat Free.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Arche Geologiczna
description: Hotel Arche Geologiczna in Warsaw provides adults-only accommodation with a bar and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The hotel is furnished in industrial style. There is a Wydawka restaurant on site, where the guests can enjoy dishes of traditional Polish cuisine and continental breakfast served every day. Blue City is 5 km from Hotel Arche Geologiczna, while Warsaw Uprising Museum is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 3.8 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Boss
description: Enjoying a picturesque setting in the Masovian Landscape Park, this hotel provides comfortable rooms with free wireless internet access. It is just 20 minutes' drive from Warsaw city centre. The modern Majaland Warsaw Amusement Park is located 9 km (8 minutes by car) from the hotel. All 136 well-presented and air-conditioned rooms come with a desk and a big flat-screen TV. Spacious bathroom is complete with a shower and a hairdryer. Free bottled water is provided. Ironing facilities and a safe can be requested at the 24-hour reception. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning and the on-site Malinowa Restaurant offers Polish and European dishes in a stylish setting. Open from 9:00 to 23:00, Lobby Bar is where guests can savour a cup of coffee and desserts from the hotel’s own bakery. Guests can explore the picturesque surroundings by foot or on a bicycle rented on site, as well as enjoy free access to fitness room from 7:00 to 22:00. Retro Club offers bowling. Hotel Boss provides 17 air-conditioned conference rooms suitable for both small business meetings and big trainings, with the biggest room for up to 550 people. All can be arranged in different layouts and feature audiovisual equipment. An additional multimedia projector, digital camcorder and interpreting services are also available. Fax and Xerox machine can be used at surcharge. The international Fredric Chopin Airport is 25 km from Hotel Boss Warszawa.Hotel Boss is accessible by Warsaw Southern Bypass. Please use interchange Wezel Patriotow to access this property. A commuter rail Warszawa Miedzeszyn Station is 600 metres away. It is 15 km from the National Stadium in Warsaw which can be reached by a direct train or bus.

name: ibis Styles Warszawa West
description: The ibis Styles Warszawa West hotel is located near the Warsaw West highway hub, just off the S8 highway and close to Flyspot wind tunnel. There are 100 modern rooms with comfortable Sweet Beds, a restaurant, car park and a conference center for up to 200 people. The ibis Styles Warszawa West hotel is a perfect place for relaxation. Guests can use the spa and bowling centers. Easy access to Chopin Airport in around 15 minutes.accorhotels.com

name: Villa Plaza
description: Located in Warsaw in the Masovia region, Villa Plaza provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a fitness room. The bed and breakfast offers a picnic area. Villa Plaza provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Blue City is 4.3 km from the accommodation, while Warsaw Uprising Museum is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Warsaw Frederic Chopin Airport, 8 km from Villa Plaza.
